attributes.action: Allow family visitors to see hospital patients post-pandemic
attributes.additional_details: If you are removing all exemptions across the uk. This should also be relaxed and allowed. Patients are worse for not seeing family. Who can help feed them, provide moral support and assist in their mental health and road to recovery.
attributes.background: We want the Government to lift all visitor restrictions within the nhs.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. There are no national limits on hospital visiting, any restrictions are a matter for individual hospital trusts.
